an10.173:1.3: Adhammanca viditva dhammanca, anatthanca viditva atthanca yatha dhammo yatha attho tatha patipajjitabbam.
an10.173:2.1: Katamo ca, bhikkhave, adhammo, katamo ca dhammo;
an10.173:2.2: katamo ca anattho, katamo ca attho?
an10.173:2.5: ye ca panatipatapaccaya aneke papaka akusala dhamma sambhavanti, ayam anattho;
an10.173:2.6: panatipata veramanipaccaya ca aneke kusala dhamma bhavanaparipurim gacchanti, ayam attho.
an10.173:4.3: ye ca micchaditthipaccaya aneke papaka akusala dhamma sambhavanti, ayam anattho;
an10.173:4.4: sammaditthipaccaya ca aneke kusala dhamma bhavanaparipurim gacchanti, ayam attho.
an10.173:5.3: Adhammanca viditva dhammanca, anatthanca viditva atthanca yatha dhammo yatha attho tatha patipajjitabban’ti,
an10.173:5.4: iti yam tam vuttam, idametam paticca vuttan”ti.
